description: Each product was created with purpose: to provide real infrastructure, direct control, and financial freedom. All interconnected, without relying on third parties.
moonwallet: Self-custody multi-chain wallet (like MetaMask). Automatic MNR import, send/receive, dApp connection, and real-time balance. Integrated "Buy crypto" button (via MoonBuy).
moonbank: Simple payments, money in motion. Digital account with card and crypto purchases (MoonBuy) directly into MoonWallet.
moonbuy: Crypto checkout & Launchpad. Buy MNR and major assets with Pix/Card and participate in selected presales. The same engine powers MoonWallet and MoonBank, with serious curation.
transparency: Audits, locks, official wallets, and MasterVault transfers published in real time.
moonplus: Infrastructure for tokenization and trading of real assets. Real estate, contracts, and regulated integrations with on-chain liquidity via MNR.
mnr: Native token of the MoonRise ecosystem. The foundation of the entire infrastructure and economy â€” with burn mechanisms, protection against manipulation, and strategically controlled distribution.
